languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away and gains +2 additional void movement points for ramming. ! Cannot be used during the end phase.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Флагман{/g} таранит врага и наносит {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g}. Урон от тарана увеличивается на 10% за каждое потраченное {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}очко пустотного перемещения{/g}, начиная с третьей клетки пройденной дистанции между флагманом и врагом. После тарана и до конца хода флагман становится {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}замедленным{/g} и не может использовать {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носовые{/g} орудия. ! Цель должна быть на расстоянии минимум 2 клеток и получает +2 дополнительных очка пустотного перемещения при таране. ! Нельзя использовать во время фазы завершения.

traits.locale_text: The flagship rams an enemy and deals damage. This damage is increased by 10% for each spent movement point starting from the third cell of distance between the Flagship and the enemy. After ramming and until the end of turn, the Flagship is slowed and unable to use prow-mounted weapons. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away ! Can't be used during the ending phase

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away and gains +2 additional void movement points for ramming. ! Can't be used during the end phase.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away and gains +2 additional void movement points for ramming. ! Cannot be used during the end phase.

The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each void {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away and gains +2 additional void movement points for ramming. ! Cannot be used during the end phase.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Флагман{/g} таранит врага и наносит {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урон{/g}. Урон от тарана увеличивается на 10% за каждое потраченное {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}очко пустотного перемещения{/g}, начиная с третьей клетки пройденной дистанции между флагманом и врагом. После тарана и до конца хода флагман становится {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}замедленным{/g} и не может использовать {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носовые{/g} орудия. ! Цель должна быть на расстоянии минимум 2 клеток и получает +2 дополнительных очка пустотного перемещения при таране. ! Нельзя использовать во время фазы завершения.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away and gains +2 additional void movement points for ramming. ! Cannot be used during the end phase.

languages.text: Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} rammt einen Feind und fügt ihm {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu. Werden dabei mehr als 3 Felder zurückgelegt, erhöht sich der Schaden für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}Leere-Bewegungspunkt{/g}, den das Flaggschiff verbraucht, um 10 %. Danach ist das Flaggschiff bis zum Ende des Zuges {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}verlangsamt{/g} und kann keine {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g}-Waffen einsetzen. ! Das Ziel muss mindestens 2 Felder entfernt sein und erhält für das Rammen +2 Leere-Bewegungspunkte. ! Kann nicht während der Endphase eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away and gains +2 additional void movement points for ramming. ! Cannot be used during the end phase.

traits.locale_text: Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} rammt einen Feind und fügt ihm {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu. Werden dabei mehr als 3 Felder zurückgelegt, erhöht sich der Schaden für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}Leere-Bewegungspunkt{/g}, den das Flaggschiff verbraucht, um 10 %. Danach und bis zum Ende des Zugs ist das Flaggschiff {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}verlangsamt{/g} und kann keine {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g}-Waffen einsetzen. ! Das Ziel muss mindestens 2 Felder entfernt sein und erhält für das Rammen +2 Leere-Bewegungspunkte. ! Kann nicht während der Endphase eingesetzt werden.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} éperonne un ennemi et lui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Ces dégâts augmentent de 10 % par {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}point de déplacement dans le Vide{/g} utilisé pour rejoindre le vaisseau ennemi, mais uniquement après avoir parcouru trois cases. Le vaisseau amiral subit alors l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}Ralentissement{/g} et est incapable d'utiliser les armes montées sur sa {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son tour. ! La cible doit se trouver à au moins 2 cases et obtient +2 points de déplacement dans le vide pour l'éperonnage. ! Non utilisable pendant la phase finale.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away and gains +2 additional void movement points for ramming. ! Cannot be used during the end phase.

traits.locale_text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} éperonne un ennemi et lui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Ces dégâts augmentent de 10 % par {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}point de déplacement dans le Vide{/g} utilisé rejoindre le vaisseau ennemi, mais uniquement après avoir parcouru trois cases. Le vaisseau amiral subit alors l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}Ralentissement{/g} et est incapable d'utiliser les armes montées à sa {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son tour. ! La cible doit se trouver à au moins 2 cases et obtient +2 points de déplacement dans le Vide pour l'éperonnage. ! Non utilisable pendant la phase finale.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}使用撞角撞击敌舰，造成{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。旗舰撞击敌舰之前，每消耗1点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移动点数{/g}，最终造成的撞击伤害就会提高10%。不过，只有当旗舰至少移动3格时，此撞击伤害加值才会生效。撞击敌舰之后，直到回合结束前，旗舰都会处于{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}减速{/g}状态，而且无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}武器。 ！目标必须在至少2格之外，撞角撞击时会额外获得2点移动点数。 ！无法在结束阶段使用。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away and gains +2 additional void movement points for ramming. ! Cannot be used during the end phase.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}使用撞角撞击敌人，造成伤害。当旗舰移动3格之后，接下来消耗的每1点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，都会使最终撞击伤害提高10%。撞击敌舰之后，直到敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束前，旗舰都会处于{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，而且无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}武器。 ！目标与旗舰必须保持至少2格距离。 ！此能力无法在结束阶段使用。

{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}使用撞角撞击敌舰，造成{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。旗舰撞击敌舰之前，每消耗1点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移动点数{/g}，最终造成的撞击伤害就会提高10%。不过，只有当旗舰至少移动3格时，此撞击伤害加值才会生效。撞击敌舰之后，直到回合结束前，旗舰都会处于{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}减速{/g}状态，而且无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}武器。 ！目标必须在至少2格之外，撞角撞击时会额外获得2点移动点数。 ！无法在结束阶段使用。

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} embiste a un enemigo infligiendo {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g}. El daño aumenta un +10 % por cada {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}punto de movimiento{/g} del vacío invertido por la nave para llegar hasta el enemigo, pero solo cuentan después de moverse tres casillas. Después, la nave queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}ralentizada{/g} y no puede usar armas de {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g} hasta el final del turno. ! El objetivo debe estar al menos a 2 casillas de distancia y gana +2 puntos de movimiento del vacío para embestir. ! No puede usarse durante la fase final.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away and gains +2 additional void movement points for ramming. ! Cannot be used during the end phase.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} embiste a un enemigo infligiendo {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g}. El daño aumenta un +10 % por cada {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}punto de movimiento del vacío{/g} invertido por la nave para llegar hasta el enemigo, pero solo cuentan después de moverse tres casillas. Después, la nave queda {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}ralentizada{/g} y no puede usar armas de {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g} hasta el final del turno. ! El objetivo debe estar al menos a 2 casillas de distancia y gana +2 puntos de movimiento del vacío para embestir. ! No puede usarse durante la fase final.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が敵に突進して、{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。このダメージは旗艦が敵まで移動するために消費したヴォイド{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移動ポイント{/g}につき +10%増加するが、3セルを移動しなければ増加しない。それから旗艦は{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}減速{/g}し、そのターンの終わりまで{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}の武器を使用できなくなる。 ! ターゲットが2セル以上離れていなければならず、突進することで+2の追加ヴォイド移動ポイントを獲得する。 ! 終了フェーズでは使用できない。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away and gains +2 additional void movement points for ramming. ! Cannot be used during the end phase.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が敵に突進して、{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。このダメージは旗艦が敵まで移動するために消費したヴォイド{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移動ポイント{/g}につき +10%増加するが、3セルを移動しなければ増加しない。それから旗艦は{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}減速{/g}し、そのターンの終わりまで{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}の武器を使用できなくなる。 ! ターゲットが2セル以上離れていなければならず、突進することで+2の追加ヴォイド移動ポイントを獲得する。 ! 終了フェーズでは使用できない。

{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}が敵に突進して、{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。このダメージは旗艦が敵まで移動するために消費した{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}ヴォイド移動ポイント{/g}につき +10%増加するが、3セルを移動しなければ増加しない。それから旗艦は{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}減速{/g}し、{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}の武器を使用できなくなる。 ! ターゲットが2セル以上離れていなければならず、突進することで+2の追加ヴォイド移動ポイントを獲得する。 ! 終了段階では使用できない。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisi{/g}, bir düşmana başıyla çarparak {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Bu hasar, sancak gemisinin düşman gemisine ulaşmak için harcadığı her {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}uçsuz hareket puanıyla{/g} +%10 artar ancak bu özellik, üç hücre yol katettikten sonra devreye girer. Sancak gemisi, bu hareketin ardından {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}yavaşlar{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}pruvaya{/g} monte edilen silahlarını turu sona erene dek kullanamaz. ! Hedef, en az 2 hücre uzakta olmalıdır ve tos vuruşu için +2 ilave uçsuz hareket puanı kazanır. ! Son evrede kullanılamaz.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} rams an enemy, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g}. This damage is increased by +10% for each {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}void movement point{/g} spent by the flagship to get to the enemy ship but only after travelling three cells. The flagship is then {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedSpace}slowed{/g} and unable to use {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted weapons until the end of its turn. ! The target must be at least 2 cells away and gains +2 additional void movement points for ramming. ! Cannot be used during the end phase.
